pages.text: Ndarahiye kuri iki camwa citiriweTtiyn na Zaytuni
No k’umusozi wa Sinayi
No kuri iki gisagara c’amahoro c’IMakkat
Ntankeka twaremye umuntu mw’ishusho ryiza cane
Hanyuma tumugarura kuba hasi gusumba abari hasi cane
Dukuyemwo abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’ukugira ibikorwa vyiza,	abo nibo bazoronka impembo itazo hera
N’igiki kigushikira n’uguhakana impembo munyuma y’ukubona ivyo vyose
Ntabwo Allah arenganura abacamanza
N’usome kw’izina ry’Umuremyi wawe yaremye
Yaremye umuntu kukimanyu c’amaraso
N’usome, n’Umuremyi wawe n’umugira neza cane
Niyo yigishije umuntu ikoresheje ikaramu
Yigishije umuntu ibintu atari abifitiye ubumenyi
None s’ibi, mu vy’ukuri umuntu yama yishima
Akishima yuko yaronse ubutunzi
Ntankeka ingaruka ya bose iri ku Muremyi wawe gusa
Mbega wabonye umwe amubuza
Umuntu mweranda ariko arasenga
Mbega wabonye yuko ari hejuru y’uburongozi
Canke ategeka kugira ibikorwa vyiza
Mbega ubona gute ko yoba ari umuhakanyi w’Imana y’ukuri nugusubira inyuma
Mbega ntabumenyi afise yuko Imana imubona
None s’ibi, nata reka kugira ivyo agira, twebwe tuzomukwega kumishatsi yiwe yo kuga hori hori k’umutwe wiwe
Aga hori hori k’umubeshi gafise ibicumuro
N’ahamagare basoma mbike biwe bamufashe
Natwe tuzohamagara aba Marayika bo mu muriro udahera bamuhane
None	s’ibi,	ntumugamburukire,	ahubwo	n’upfukame	ushire	umutwe wawe hasi ube hafi cane y’Umuremyi wawe
